about_the_game:
Harmony Islands is a relaxing crafting simulation game. Gather, craft and build your home on a randomly generated world made up of several islands. Explore the seas to find more islands with exciting unique items to bring back and use to craft. Build and supply a great ship to return home or stay on the island forever.




Resource gathering for crafting items. You will need to craft many items to build and supply your ship if you want to get off the island. Of course, you don't have to leave the island if you don't want to.




Build many structure to make living on your island a fun place to be. You will need to build a place to sleep at night and somewhere to store all of your belongings.




Craft various useful items that will help you build a thriving home on your island. You will need to craft many items to build and supply the ship that will take you home.




Explore the seas to find new islands. New islands will have different items to gather in things to see. See if you can chart the entire map and find everything there is.

Features:

  • Resource gathering for crafting items. You will need to craft many items to build and supply your ship if you want to get off the island. Of course, you don't have to leave the island if you don't want to.

  • Explore the seas to find other islands. The other islands will have different resources which you will need to craft certain items.

  • Craft and build a place to live on the island while you are working on your ship. You will need a place to sleep and grow your food to make the journey home. It will take some time to gather all the things needed for your ship, so you may as well make your time on the island enjoyable.

  • Play the game over again and get an entirely new set of islands and a new challenge.
